rules: Rule1: If mission1 is scheduled, then the operation is safe.
Rule2: Provided that surveillance is usable, the imagery is not reliable.
Rule3: Whenever tracking is active, surveillance is usable.
Rule4: If an obstacle is detected, then evasion is not initiated.
Rule5: Either an obstacle is detected or the operation is safe.
Rule6: In cases where collision avoidance is activated, evasion is initiated.
Rule7: Should vehicle1 be ready, the operation is safe.
Rule8: Whenever the destination is reached, the operation is safe.
Rule9: If the recipient is verified, then delivery is completed.
Rule10: The recipient is verified or the package is secured.
Rule11: Whenever the package is secured, the signature is confirmed.
Rule12: In cases where the signature is confirmed, the destination is reached.
Rule13: If the mission is successful, then if the flight plan is not approved or the drone is not available, takeoff is not authorized.
Rule14: Should routing be efficient, the mission is successful.
Rule15: Either routing is efficient or the path is optimized.
Rule16: If the flight plan is approved, then mission1 is scheduled.
Rule17: Either performance is analyzed or data is reviewed.
Rule18: If data is reviewed, then if it is not the case that if the path is optimized then the mission is successful, arrival is delayed.
Rule19: Provided that a report is generated, then if performance is analyzed, then if it is not the case that if the path is optimized then the mission is successful, arrival is delayed.
Rule20: Whenever logs are compiled, then if performance is analyzed, then if it is not the case that if the path is optimized then the mission is successful, arrival is delayed.
Rule21: If objectives are achieved, then either a report is generated or logs are compiled.
Rule22: Should drone1 be available, vehicle1 is ready.
Rule23: If the weather is checked, then if the flight plan is not approved or drone1 is not available, takeoff is not authorized.
Rule24: In cases where the sensor suite is operational, the operation is safe.
Rule25: Either the sensor suite is operational or GPS is functioning.
Rule26: Either the camera is calibrated or if GPS is functioning then the operation is safe.
Rule27: Provided that it is not the case that the lens is damaged or the camera is not calibrated, the imagery is reliable.
Rule28: In cases where it is not the case that the lens is damaged or the camera is not calibrated, tracking is active.
Rule29: If it is not the case that if an obstacle is detected then collision avoidance is activated, control is manual.
Rule30: Provided that it is not the case that navigation is automated or control is not manual, flight is not stable.
Rule31: Should it not be the case that if the path is optimized then the mission is successful, arrival is not delayed.
Rule32: If the flight plan is not approved or drone1 is not available, takeoff is authorized.
Rule33: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that navigation is automated or control is not manual then flight is stable, landing is emergency.
Rule34: Should it not be the case that if it is not the case that navigation is automated or control is not manual then flight is stable, landing is not emergency.
Rule35: In cases where objectives are not achieved, expectations are exceeded.
Rule36: Provided that objectives are not achieved, expectations are not exceeded.
facts: Fact2: The lens is not damaged.
